metadata.name: Isaac is sus
metadata.description:
OH MY F*CKING GOD, ISAAC IS SUS
This mod add two new characters: Amogus and the imposter and replace ventricle razor for vent
Coop compatible
Maybe in the future I add the Among us Drip
This is my first mod, sory if the costumes of the items replace the Among us costume, if anyone knows how to do alternatives costumes only for amogus and the imposter, pelase teach me
And if anyone also knws how to put more than one image in steam also teach meplease
